bug.author: Liuxinyue521
bug.description: Thanks for your great work! I have some confusion about 2d poses in 3DPW. In their official read_me file, they said 2d poses are in Coco-Format. But in the pkl file, poses 2d have shape (n_persons, 3, 18). And in your code, coco-format has only 17 joints, so I am confused about the order of the 18 joints. Can you tell me the name and order of these joints? Thanks in advance.

comments.comment: Find the annotation instructions from the original paper
